Service Explorer Plugin for Altap Salamander
Copyright (C) 2009 MJ
http://www.jamik.de
support@jamik.de

This plugin is freeware and supports Altap Salamander Version 2.50, 2.51 and 2.52.

Installation
------------
 1. Copy the contents of the archive to a new folder in the Salamander Plugins Folder
 2. Go to Altap Salamander > Plugins > Plugins Manager...
 3. Click 'Add'.
 4. Navigate to the folder containing the plugin and select "svcexp.spl".
 5. The plugin is now accessible in the Alt+F1/F2 Menu and will list all installed services

Uninstall
------------
1. Go to Altap Salamander > Plugins > Plugins Manager...
2. Locate the plugin
3. Click 'Remove'
4. Remove the plugin folder which was created in the installation
 

Terms of Use
------------
This software is provided "as is", without any guarantee made
as to its suitability or fitness for any particular use. It may
contain bugs, so use of this tool is at your own risk. I take no 
responsilbity for any damage that may unintentionally be caused
through its use.

Reporting Problems
------------------
If you encounter problems, please visit the Altap Salamander forum at http://forum.altap.cz/
and download the latest version to see if the issue has been resolved.
If not, either post a message in the "Plugin Development" forum or send a bug report to:
support@jamik.de
